profile:
Ambia Windows and Doors has established itself as a premier provider of quality windows and doors that combine innovative design with superb construction. Our extensive knowledge is your guarantee that you’re getting the best product and service.Custom and specialty work is our expertise. Our many satisfied customers recognize our product lines for their design excellence, traditional craftsmanship, sophisticated technology and product integrity. You'll find our windows and doors in homes that range from simple to superb, throughout the GTA and surrounding areas. And, homeowners are sure to enjoy the comfort our varied line of window and door collections – even on the warmest or coldest day.

*****

Our sales and installation team can accommodate all your needs, efficiently and effectively, while our superior standards and lifetime warranties apply to everyone. Because we work closely with our manufacturer, you can be sure your project will be completed on-time and on-budget.This commitment to service enables us to establish long-term relationship with all our valued customers. When it comes to Service, we never compromise.

profile:
Customer satisfaction is one of our top priorities as New Look Windows & Doors. Our products are creative, top notch and always manufactured, assembled and set up by experienced workers. Top quality replacement vinyl windows, energy saving insulated steel doors, aluminum windows and vinyl patio doors, entrance doors, storm doors and porch enclosures are only a few of the products we offer, at a fair and competitive price range.

****

Did you know vinyl windows are currently the most popular types of windows all over Canada? This is only because they’re immune to rust, corrosion and almost every type of physical damage (chipping, peeling), which could only mean they’re built to last. The investment will pay off in your energy bill savings, as vinyl windows provide perfect insulation, preventing heat loss. Just to prove you we’re very confident about the quality of our products, every New Look window and door comes with a lifetime warranty that’s also transferable!
New Look windows are equipped with Energy Advantage Low E Glass, which consists of sealed glass chambers filled with inert gas (we use Argon) for more efficient thermal insulation. That way, you could save up to 30% (or even more) of your energy bills a year! New Look windows & Doors will turn your home into an exotic retreat from the frightful winter weather, and will keep the chilly air conditioning breeze inside during hot summer afternoons

profile:
BETTER INSTALLATION. LOWER ENERGY COSTS:
 
Windows and doors are one of the most significant purchases you'll make when building or renovating your home. It's something you want to get right - the first time. That's why homeowners across the GTA choose Casa Bella Windows & Doors, with more than 60 years experience in manufacturing and installation.
 
At Casa Bella, your window and door specialists:
 
•	Choose from an extensive selection of windows. From the economical Classic range to the premium Uniqwood series, we can meet your individual requirements. 
•	Our standard and specialty selection of windows include Casement Windows that are easy to operate and energy efficient; Vertical/Horizontal Sliding Windows that offers an economical design with maximum ventilation; dramatic Bay and Bow windows that make a statement, add contour and increase the natural lighting in your home; and contemporary specialty shaped that add a distinctive touch to your home. 
•	When it comes to doors, Casa Bella has a complete list of options for your home. Steel entry doors are energy efficient and can reduce your energy bills; fiberglass and wood doors add a cosy, homely touch; patio and garden doors add an extra touch of summer and allow easy access to the outdoors. 
 
At Casa Bella, we manufacture and install the best quality windows and doors. 
 
Customer service is our number one priority. We never outsource the installation of your new windows and doors to a sub-contractor. All of our professional installation crews are bonded and insured Casa Bella employees who are paid to do the job right, the first time.
 
Trust. Quality. Service
Experience the Casa Bella Advantage
For a windows and door professional you can trust…call CasaBella. 416-650-1033

profile: Windows, Doors, Porch Enclosures... TOTAL HOME WINDOWS and DOORS is a Toronto based renovating and home improvement company that has a proven reputation for its high quality windows and doors installation and great customer service. We at Total Home Window and Doors are proud of the products and services that we provide to our customers. We offer the BEST CHOICES from the BEST MANUFACTURERS that use innovative technology and design. Our pedantry, responsibility and strive toward absolute order and tight control in each stage of work are a warranty of our clients' absolute satisfaction. Quality and Comfort Have Never Been So Affordable! Total Home Windows and Doors are fully qualified for the Greener Home Rebate program. The Canada Greener Homes Grant will help homeowners make their homes more energy-efficient and fight climate change. Check out the website below for more information and to find out how you can qualify: https://www.nrcan.gc.ca/energy-efficiency/homes/canada-greener-homes-grant/23441 Our mission, at Total Home Windows and Doors is to help you make the best possible choice for saving energy while establishing comfort and elegance that will compliment any interior and exterior. We guarantee the quality and durability in the products we sell and install and offer a lifetime no limitation manufacturer warranty on all our windows and doors. We meet all specific customers needs with affordable rates and find most suitable promotional deals. All the products we provide will be installed by our professional team fast & hassle free. All of our products are fully guaranteed, with an industry leading warranty. Total Home Windows Doors

Comfortec Windows and Doors is a company with over 16 years of experience and is committed to full customer satisfaction by offering high-quality windows and doors, beautiful designs, and exceptional customer service.

Whether you are building a new home or renovating with replacement windows and doors, we have the products and experience to turn your vision into success. With the variety of products we carry, we are able to accommodate any budget. Find out how we can help enhance your home exterior comfort and maximize your energy savings. We service the areas of Toronto & GTA, including but not limited to Richmond Hill, Vaughan, North York, and Woodbridge. 

Comfortec Windows and Doors is a member of the National Window Wise Certification program. Our high-performance vinyl windows are designed to reduce energy loss, condensation, and outdoor noise, helping you save on heating and cooling costs and increase your home value.

profile:
SPECIALIZING IN WROUGHT IRON AND DECORATIVE GLASS DOOR INSERTS


Distinctive Glass Inserts Ontario's Largest Installers Of high quality Decorative and Wrought Iron Glass Door Inserts. We carry the largest, most extensive selection of Glass Door inserts at the best prices and provide guaranteed professional installation.


What makes Distinctive Glass inserts different is that we are a full time family run company,  and we are committed to helping consumers make an educated decision, and feel confident In The Wrought Iron Or Decorative Glass Door Insert That They Choose. We provide a 10 year warranty on All Of Our Glass Door Inserts, and will replace your Glass Insert promptly if there are any problems. .Buyer Beware your warranty is not valid if the individual is not selling glass  a year from now. Your Warranty will Be gone the minute they leave the premises. Often times people call us to repair or replace defective glass Inserts, because they are unable to Find the original installer. We hear often that people have tried to get in contact with the company that installed the glass but are told they are no longer in business and no where to be found.

Your front entrance is the first thing people see, give us a call and get it done right the first time.



They say first impressions are everything, the same goes for your home. Your front door is the first thing your guests will see. Our Wrought Iron & Decorative Glass door inserts create that everlasting first impression. Our designs are timeless and we are sure you will find a style that will match your beautiful home.

profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyone’s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

www.encorewindows.com and www.bquiet.ca and Encore Windows and Encore Windows & Doors
In business since 1987, we specialize in the highest quality energy efficient window and door replacements. We guarantee you will know which windows and doors are best for you, and why before you buy. No high pressure salespeople. We provide exclusive designed windows and doors with all options of color, styles, finishes, shapes, glass, treatments, wood, vinyl and metal and metal clad. We are exclusive dealers for Soundproof windows. If you have a window or door problem we have the right solution for you. We Guarantee our delivery time for most products and once started we stay until the job is complete. Our entire staff is 100% trained and committed to provide you with the highest level of service and satisfaction. The highest level of care is taken to ensure your window and door project is completely stress free. The utmost care is taken while working in your home. You will be completely informed and in control during every step of your installation from the selection process right to the final moment of your project. 
 
Encore Windows & Doors is a well established window and door company and an Energy Star company, committed to providing the most efficient products available. Our mission is to continually raise the standard of a window and door company. Encore Windows guarantees that you’ll receive the finest quality windows in Canada. We are authorized dealers for CSA Certified windows. Your windows are guaranteed to be installed properly by Window Wise Certified installers. Feel secure your investment is unconditionally protected. We give you a complete lifetime warranty on parts and labor. We promise you will know which windows are best for you and why, before you buy. No pressure – we employ certified professionals. Our aim is to be much more than a normal window and door company. Our windows and doors are built with you in mind. The same applies to the way we work.

profile:
Centennial Windows & Doors is a family owned and operated business that offers an end-to-end solution for replacement windows and doors. We sell, manufacture, install, and service our own complete line of award winning, energy efficient windows and doors.
 
Why homeowners choose Centennial Windows & Doors
 
The Best Warranty
- We provide a 100% warranty on everything we do for as long as you own your home – NO fine print and NO exclusions. And if you sell your home, it's transferable to new homeowners within 10 years of purchasing Centennial windows and doors.
 
Responsibility and Accountability
- We take full responsibility to manufacture, install, and service your windows and doors. You are dealing with ONE company only and one phone number. 
 
Proven Installation Quality
- We DO NOT hire subcontractors. All work is performed by our full time, uniformed employees, fully covered under Workers’ Compensation. Centennial Installers were the first in Canada to write the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) Fenestration Installation Technician (FIT) certification exam.
 
Leaders in Energy Efficiency
- Centennial Windows & Doors was the first window company in Canada to be ENERGY STAR® certified. We have been awarded the:
          - 2004 – ENERGY STAR Manufacturer of the Year Award
          - 2005 – ENERGY STAR Retailer of the Year Award
          - 2008 – ENERGY STAR Sustained Excellence Award
          - 2014 – ENERGY STAR Manufacturer of the Year Award – Windows and Doors
- Since 2013, our windows have been recognized as ENERGY STAR Most Efficient.

profile:
WELDA Windows and Doors where Quality Doesn`t Cost - It Pays! ----WELDA Windows and Doors - Ontario’s Home Improvement Company installs Energy Star vinyl windows, residential entry doors and patio / porch / entrance enclosures to fit any home in Toronto, GTA, Ontario. If you`re planing to upgrade your windows, doors or porch enclosure and price, quality, and service are important - you need to contact WELDA Windows and Doors.--- www. weldawindows.com --- www.ontariowindowsanddoors.ca--- We also supply and install window coverings and retractable awnings. 

Please visit www.weldashading.com---

***

Whether your preference is for basic sliding windows and steel entry doors or your taste is more for casement windows and fiberglass doors,  WELDA Windows & Doors home improvement company has the solution for you.  Replacement vinyl windows in Toronto; front entrance doors in Toronto, GTA, Barrie; energy star windows in Toronto, Brampton; porch enclosures in Oakville, Oshawa;  sliding patio doors in Kitchener, Burlington, Ajax.


***

WELDA Windows and Doors offers a full line of vinyl replacement windows, residential entry doors, porch enclosures and window coverings to enhance the architectural style of any home in the Greater Toronto Area.

***

Investing in new windows and doors should be a one-time investment, so we make every effort to provide our customers with the education and understanding they need to make an informed buying decision.

***

At WELDA Windows, our approach is different. First of all, rather than "sell" you anything, we help you "buy" windows and doors by listening to your needs and then matching those needs with the right product and installation to meet those needs. Homeowners who make "informed buying decisions" based upon having all their needs met and understanding what they are purchasing are the most satisfied customers.

***

Our consultants are very skilled at walking you through the buying process, listening to your needs and concerns, explaining the features and benefits of each product and installation and arriving at the best choice to fill your needs. They can even explain the many financing options that are available to help you get the products you want, when you want them. After choices are made, our consultants can explain the installation process. Our custom installation methods and techniques assure a neat, clean, efficient installation in your home. WELDA stands behind its work like no other home improvement company. 

***

Our products & services include:
*Energy Efficient Windows & Doors, CSA Rated, Energy Star
*Single & Double Slider Window
*Awning Window
*Single & Double Hung Window
*Casement Window
*Picture Window
*Bay Windows
*Bow Windows
*Steel Entrance Door
*Fiberglass Entry Door
*Garden Hinged Door
*Exterior Sliding Patio Door
*Windows & Doors Installation
*Porch Enclosures
*Window Coverings
*Custom Interior Shutters

***

See full details of all our products on our website: www.weldawindows.com and www.ontariowindowsanddoors.ca

profile:
Clera Windows + Doors by FM Industries has been manufacturing and installing windows and doors throughout all of Ontario since 1978.  They add beauty and value to nearly 1000 homes every month and can easily service the entire province via one of their 37 sales and installation offices.

 

Clera Windows + Doors has been recognized as one of Canada’s Best 50 Privately Managed Companies and the City of Vaughan’s Company of the Year.  Clera was recently awarded the Houzz service award for 2014 and is a proud recipient of the Homestars Best Award for 2012 and 2013. Add to these achievements a stellar A+ Better Business Bureau rating and you’ll understand why Clera Windows + Doors is the best choice for new windows and doors for your home.

 

We manufacture.  We install.  You save.

Panes window manufacturing is a family owned business that specializes in the manufacturing of high-quality, high-efficiency vinyl windows. With over 100 years of combined experience, Our team consists of highly qualified professionals in the Window Manufacturing industry. 

Integrity and Innovation
Panes Window Manufacturing has always coupled its commitment to innovative and performance-driven products with its unwavering dedication to customer service. Those were our values yesterday. Those are our values today. 

As pioneers in the window and door industry, Panes Window Manufacturing continually listens to the needs of the industry. The result is ongoing research and development of highly innovative, top performing, and beautifully crafted windows. 

Highlights
Custom crafted windows
Extensive and highly innovative product offering Premium quality materials
Design flexibility with countless options available
Industry leader in energy efficiency and ENERGY STAR® partner
Knowledgeable customer care teams
Experienced field service support
Architectural support
Environmentally responsible

profile: Gem Windows and Doors is Toronto's oldest and most trusted window and door retailer, serving South Western Ontario for over 55 years!  Our showroom is designed to offer our customers choices from a wide range of window and door products. We specialize in custom window design and fabrication. We source windows worldwide to meet all of our customer’s requirements.
service_area: Etobicoke, Toronto Central,Brampton, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington
products:
Today’s vinyl windows are high-tech, ENERGY STAR approved, double and triple glazed, painted with a host of accessories such as brick moulds and interior jambs. Aluminum windows are efficient and thermally broken. They have found their way back to residential homes, in addition to commercial uses. Of course, GEM can also supply wood windows and fiberglass windows. Hybrid windows can be either aluminum clad wood or vinyl or even wood-vinyl composites.

GEM is now a distributor for Mastergrain Fiberglass Doors, the leading fiberglass residential entry door. Of course, we carry complete packages of insulated steel doors and wood doors. Don’t forget our fire rated products and commercial doors! 

Modern homes are utilizing doors that could be considered walls! Lift and Slide Doors can be built in sizes only dreamed about, as can Bi-fold doors and multi-track stacking doors. We must not leave out a full complement of patio doors which GEM offers! A great door requires a great screen and GEM has the pleated retractable and roll-away screens you need. GEM has storm doors to meet your custom as well as standard requirements.

Quality Window coverings include a host of blind and shade styles. These are not only the hand operated types but include both hard-wired and solar powered units that raise and lower at the push of a button. GEM also offers interior partitions, interior doors, shower enclosures and glass enclosures inside your home. GEM can manufacture and install railing, canopies, solariums and porch enclosures!
services: Come to GEM for the best selection for window and door sales and installation. We are fabricators of aluminum windows and sub-fabricator of selected products. We can provide your custom products for new construction and renovation.
brands: Our brands include Pella, Armor, NanaWall, Cardinal Glass, Royal Plastics, Energi, Synergy, Spartan, Windspec, Everlast, Old Castle Glass, Emtek, EntryGuard, Dorplex, Palma, Sunview, Novatech, Mastergain, GEM Transitional and GEM Contemporary. These cover the full range of styles such as modern, traditional, transitional, new constructions, custom, renovation and urban.
specialities:
GEM is your one-stop problem solver. Is it getting noisy when you want to sleep? We are experts at soundproofing windows to reduce sound transfer into your home.

We invite you to visit our showroom to speak to our professional sales team, to learn more about our high quality custom products.
payment_method: Cash, Cheque, Visa, Mastercard, and Financing Available
licenses: GEM is a licensed contractor and maintains a manufacturing license. We are WSIB participants, member
warranty_terms: Manufacture Warranty plus 5 years of GEM installation

profile:
Established in 1988, Torwin has become a trusted source for all of your external home renovation needs. With over 75 years of combined experience, we are industry leaders specializing in window and door product services and installations. We pride ourselves on quality and craftsmanship.
With humble beginnings, we began with window and door system sales. Over the years we have grown to expand our product and service offering to include: brick and frame knockouts, custom wood work, moldings, shutters (interior and exterior), siding, eavestrough, fascia, hardware, custom glass work, architectural décor and sealed unit repair. 
From an extensive showroom to our own in-house installation crews, we have grown over the years in response to the demand for the “Torwin Touch,” a way of doing business putting the customer first.  We develop relationships and truly believe that our work is a reflection of our name.
Privately owned and operated, our hands-on experience allows us to make you comfortable in your decision process.

profile: EcoTech Windows & Doors has been installing energy efficient windows and doors for Ontario homeowners since 2001.  If you are ready to replace your home's windows and doors, you have found the right company.  We offer a superior product manufactured and installed to perfection at a great price.  We strive for 100% customer satisfaction ensuring our customers are happy with their order while having access to great customer service throughout the sales and installation process.  Our product line is designed to withstand Canadian climates, leaving you secure, protected and warm through the harshest winter days but cool and relaxed during the summer heat. We offer a wide selection of vinyl window styles including casement windows, awning windows, single hung and double hung windows, single slider tilt and double slider tilt windows, bay and bow windows and more. In addition to our full line of energy efficient vinyl windows, we also offer a wide selection of beautiful exterior doors in various designs and colours.  Make your home energy efficient and instantly improve your curb appeal with EcoTech Windows and Doors.  Call 1-888-901-7276 for a free in-home estimate today!

profile:
Family owned and operated A & J Windows & Doors has served Toronto and surrounding communities for over 30 years, offering sales and installation of quality doors and windows for residential and commercial customers.
 
Save Time, Stress and Money
 
There are many options available today for buying, installing and replacing doors and windows, so much so that choosing the right type, brand and style for your needs can become a stressful and time consuming experience. But it doesn’t have to be that way. Whether you need to install new windows in your custom home, replace existing windows or doors in your current residence, or are interested in saving money with new energy efficient models, we promise to deliver unmatched service and top-quality products at a competitive price. Some of the products and services we offer include:
 
Windows– We install vinyl windows in a variety of colours and styles, including casements, double hung and slider.
 
Doors– Choose from entrance doors available in insulated steel or fibreglass and in your choice of colour and gloss, as well as patio and garden doors in a selection of glass styles.
 
Railings– We are experienced in the installation of quality aluminum railings, available in various styles and colours.
 
Repairs– We offer repairs of most brands of doors and windows, as well as repairs for screens and glass performed in our shop.

Window Wise Certified

profile:
Welcome to AMICA Windows and Doors Inc.
#1 Choice for Homeowners, Renovators, Architects and Builders!
  
We supply and install windows/ doors in Toronto and the GTA!

Honest, non-pushy, helpful and extremely knowledgeable with regards to every aspect including design/colour and style. All of our estimates are provided in black and white with all the details of the project outlined and our estimates and design consultations are FREE!

We offer a range of interior and exterior options for Windows and Doors. All our products are built locally to meet and exceed all Canadian norms and quality standards and are backed by industry leading truly worry free guarantees. Our services include:

Windows Installations
Entrance Door Installations
Garden Door Installations
Patio Door Installations
Bi-Fold Door installations.

Our quality and service are second to none, which is why we provide a full satisfaction guarantee. If you are looking for the best door installation services, then please complete our quick online form with all the details of your needs, upon which our Sales Consultants will contact you to arrange a time to visit you in the comfort of your own home. On-site measuring and advice can be offered while viewing your unique project requirements.

For over 15 years we have successfully installed windows and doors for thousands of customers all across Toronto and the GTA area.

This includes cities such as Toronto, Mississauga, Brampton, Vaughan, North York, Etobicoke, Scarborough, Malton, Richmond Hill, Leslieville, Woodbridge, Maple, Whitby, Pickering, Oakville, Markham, Ajax, Oshawa, East York, Beaches and New Market, Ontario.
Visit us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram

profile:
Vista One Retractable Screens supplies and installs the most innovative retractable screens for doors and windows. We have several models to choose from, those that Rollaway, and others that Foldaway. They all retract into a compact cassette when not in use. Our screens provide the best protection against flying insects while providing ventilation to your home.

There are four main components to Retractable Screens, whether they Rollaway or Foldaway - Housing, Mesh, Pull Rail/Slide Bar, Guide rails. 

Traditional fixed screens have limitations: they are unattractive, obstruct the view within and without; prone to damage; difficult to maneuver; hard to clean.

A retractable screen from Vista One is durable, safe and easy to operate. With our extensive line of screens to choose from we have a screen to compliment any home design. Our custom screens provide a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor living spaces, blending the best of both worlds!
products: Retractable screens, retractable screens for door, retractable screens for windows, and retractable screens for large openings.
services: We provide the supply, and installation of retractable screens. We have a host of colours that will match most any decor.
brands: Vista One brands include our Rollaway Series screens and our Foldaway Series.
specialities: Vista One provides retractable screen solutions for all types and sizes of openings.
warranty_terms: Manufacturers Limited Lifetime on Product, 2 Years on Labour.

profile:
Landmark Home Solutions have been supplying comfort and peace of mind to homeowners across Ontario since 1987. We’re proud to offer one of the most energy efficient windows available on the market today that offers homeowners a significant return on investment all while being backed with the strongest warranty in the business today!
 
We’re part of the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) and the Better Business Bureau, and in all the years we’ve been in business, we’ve never had an unresolved complaint. We’re members of SAWDAC (Siding and Window Dealers Association of Canada) and make sure that we meet their membership criteria, code of ethics and sign an ironclad five-year workmanship guarantee statement.
 
We’re also proud to say that our windows are Energy Star certified.  As you probably know, the international Energy Star symbol is a simple way for consumers to identify products that are among the most energy-efficient on the market. We also offer financing through TD Canada Trust, ensuring that our customers have a trustworthy partner too.
Based in St. Catharines, Ontario, 

Landmark Home Solutions is proud to represent our Canadian heritage in all that we do.  Our windows are made right here, so you know you’re getting the best quality windows in the world.

1: 100% Canadian made. Our products and everything our company has to offer is 100% Canadian made. It is engineered and designed especially for the Canadian weather.


2: Beauty and Comfort. Not only are our products guaranteed to beautify your household, but you will also add comfort at the same time. Our technology ensures your house remains cooler in the summer, while staying warmer in the cold winters.


3: Save money. Our missions to provide a high quality product at affordable pricing. Our prices remain guaranteed, without the sacrifice of quality. In addition to this we offer flexible financing packages for our customers.


4: Expert installation A high quality product is useless without having experienced installers - our installers are highly experienced (over 20 years), certified and professional, ensuring the job is done accurately the first time.


5: Best warranty the industry has to offer. Apart from the best products, we offer our customers with the best warranty the industry has to offer without any hidden messages or clauses.


6: Highest level of customer service the industry has to offer. At Lifetime, we thrive off our quality and our work is guaranteed , but just like any other business, without a high level of customer service, we wouldn't be doing out customers justice. We take pride in our customer service - all requests, services, calls are answered and worked on immediately.

products: CSA certified: All of our windows are CSA certified. Our supplier was one of the first manufacturers to achieve certification for combination windows in Canada.
services:
WINDOWS
LOE GLASS OPTION: Standard window glass isn't capable of filtering out heat in the summer, or retaining heat in the winter. LoE coatings boost the insulating value by 40%, reducing the build-up of condensation and protects your interior furnishings from fading in.

WHITE "S CLASS" SUPER SPACER TECHNOLOGY: Inside quality built windows you will find a spacer between the layers of glass. The spacer is usually constructed of steel or metal. Its purpose is to separate, seal and insulate the layers of glass, helping to keep your home warmer.

SIMPLY-CLEAN: With our Standard Simply-Clean® coating, the sun will actually help to keep your windows clean. As the sun's rays contact the coating, Simply-Clean® is activated, helping loosen dust, dirt and other organic deposits.

MULTICHAMBER POLYRESIN 3 PVC: Our advanced multi-chamber vinyl frame, manufactured from our exclusive Lead-free, 100% virgin Polyresin 3® PVC. Designed to draw moisture away from the window to the drains, reducing condensation and the formation of mould and mildew.

PREMIUM HEAVY DUTY HARDWARE: Every window utilizes the finest available hardware. This includes foldaway handles and high quality, push down, fiber glass screens.

FLY MAZE: As a standard practice, the windows are installed with a sponge-like insect guard inside our hollow multi-chamber frames. This prevents insects from nesting or entering through the window frame.

FUSION MITRED WELDED SASH AND FRAME: All the window sashes and frames are precision-mitred, then fusion welded using extreme heat and pressure. This ensures a virtually inseparable bond at every joint.

 TRIPLE WEATHER SEALS: These seals are oversized for higher performance and built into the frame to prevent any air transfer, allowing for a completely sealed unit.

SOLAR BOND PAINT: There are 13 standard window colours for you to choose from. We can also custom colour match your windows, so they co-ordinate with any existing outdoor decor finishes. All standard paint coatings will resist fading and are covered under warranty.

DOORS
Every line of doors we offer comes with a package of performance that is unrivaled in the industry. With a front door by Lifetime, not only will you see an increase in comfort, energy efficiency and performance, you will also see an increase in curb appeal. In fact, you can increase the perceived value of your home just by adding a Lifetime entry door system.
We offer the widest collection in the industry - if you have a custom door in mind - we can get it made for you!

1: Patio Doors: We have the perfect patio doors for your home! We offer 5 different kids of doors that cater to your personal needs. Weather it is security, easy of use, look, energy efficiency- we have a door that will cater to your home and ensure comfort. Easy to slide, strong, safe and energy efficiency is a guarantee with all options.

2: Steel Doors: Our traditional steel door lines offer economical, safe, and durable options for your entryway. Perfect for the harsh canadian winters + 100% maintenance free.

3: Fiber Glass and Wood Doors: Beautifully crafted, energy efficient, secure, and easy to maintain, Lifetime fiberglass entry doors are a durable alternative to wood or steel. We also have a wide collection of solid wood doors that are custom made to your needs.

At Nordik Windows, we strive to be ahead of the curve when it comes to the latest and greatest in window and door technology. So, if you’re ready to give your home the upgrade it deserves, you’ve come to the right place.

Providing you with the best of the best in windows and doors has been Nordik’s passion for over 40 years. Home is where the heart is and we want you to feel like family, which is why we provide a 360-customer experience: manufacturing, installation, servicing, and one of the best warranties in the industry.

Proudly serving the Greater Toronto and Hamilton Area and beyond.

profile:
Phantom Screens/ Ontario Screen Systems offers a beautiful alternative to traditional insect screens. Manufactured in Canada, Phantom retractable screens disappear when not in use and come in a variety of colours to match virtually any décor, all while blending in perfectly with door trim to maintaining the home’s architectural integrity. 

These screens can be cover all window types including casement, awning, single & double-hung, sliding and tilt ‘n’turn windows.

They are also customized for double french doors, swing in swing out doors, sliding doors, and oversized doors.

Motorized retractable screens by Phantom provide insect protection, climate control and solar shading without blocking your views.

Visit https://phantomscreens.ca/ and talk to a Screen Expert today.
products: All of Phantom Screens, including retractable screen doors, windows and motorized screens
services: Our trained installation technicians and the Limited Lifetime Warranty ensure that Phantom Screens last a lifetime.
brands: Phantom Screens, Phantom retractable screens
specialities:
Once you've made contact with us at Ontario Screen Systems Inc., we will talk to you about your requirements and ideas you have. We’ll then take detailed measurements and prepare you an estimate. We'll also schedule an installation date with you.

Depending on how many doors and window screens you order, most installations are completed within one day. However, before we schedule an installation with you we will take into account any manufacturing lead times when ordering your screens. There are a number of installation options for our large opening (manual and motorized) screens including fully recessed and surface mounted and so the time taken for installation will vary for every project.

Our door and window screens, as well as our screens for large openings are professionally installed by Phantom-trained installers who will treat your home with care.

Call us today and experience Phantom Screens.

profile:
Notice: During the COVID-19 pandemic, Window Experts is operational during this time for all your needs. We are able to provide quotations and estimates through the practice of social distancing and safety measures. Call us today for a free quote at 416-844-0099!
  
 
The Window Experts is a Canadian company that has been installing Canadian-made, high-quality windows and doors, for over 15 years. We are committed to providing exceptional service to help transform your dream home into a reality, starting with your windows and doors.

The majority of our business is based on referrals from our satisfied customers, therefore, we work with integrity and want to be your number one choice for doors’ and windows’ replacements!

Our Services:
1) Installation services for builders and contractors:
We supply and install windows and doors from Window Wise certified manufacturers.

2) Installation services for windows and doors companies and manufacturers:
Windows and doors companies and manufacturers face several points of pressure. You need to cater to the volume of requests received as well as meet deadlines that might often be unreasonable.
In such situations, a reliable contractor, who can take the responsibility of professional installations off your hand, can be a blessing. At Window Experts, we realize that and we will be happy to assist you with any and all types of window-installations, including:

Brick to Brick installation (Vinyl Windows/Aluminum Windows)
Retrofit/Frame to Frame installation (Vinyl Windows)
Bay to build/Bow to build (with roof/with skirt)
Sliding Doors (any type of standard/custom)
Entrance Doors (Steel/Vinyl/Wood/Fiberglass)
Garden Doors (Steel/Vinyl/Wood/Fiberglass)

3) Inspection services:
The need to conduct regular window inspections has been, increasingly, receiving the recognition it deserves. Be it commissioned by regulatory authorities, builders/ contractors, or requested by homeowners themselves, inspections offer a window of opportunity to identify issues before they occur. The issues, in turn, might result in a loss of finances, time or health.

Take, for instance, the case of humidity. Condensation and frost that collect on the surface of poor quality windows can permeate and create moisture, inside homes. This will, in turn, have ramifications on inhabitants’ lung health, in the long run.

This is why, inspecting windows before purchasing them or signing with a contractor, is strongly recommended. Windows Experts offer independent inspection services for companies and clients who had already replaced their windows or doors, but have questions or concerns.

COVID 19 UPDATE:We are open for business and can schedule virtual meetings, calls and phone calls at your convenience. We are following all the health and safety measures as directed by the Province of Ontario. We are committed to ensuring the safety of our employees and customers. 


****

Heritage Home Design is a full-service windows and doors installation company that wants to make your new or existing home look beautiful from the ground up. Working with our unique collection of classically-styled windows and doors, we install the right product for the right space, ensuring that your home looks perfect, while also making it more energy efficient. From your garage, front door, and patio doors to your bedroom, living, dining and bay windows, we offer a unique line of stunning products that will not only make your house look great, but will also keep you cooler in the summer, and warmer in the winter.

***
 
Plus, all of our windows and doors come with a double lifetime warranty. Our manufacturer offers a lifetime warranty on all of our windows and doors, and Heritage Home Design provides a quality installation warranty for the life of your home. Financing is available and all major credit cards are accepted.

profile:
Oakville Windows & Doors has been helping people find the perfect window or door for their home since 2010.


We believe that windows and doors really impact the look of your home. Not only will a stunning new door or a set of windows improve your home’s curb appeal and overall look –  they’ll also make your home safer, more secure and more energy efficient.


When it comes to windows and doors, there’s no such thing as a one-size-fits-all solution. That’s why our experienced team will work with you one-on-one from day one to find the style, material and size that works best for your home and your needs. We carry full insurance and our workers are covered by WSIB.


Oakville Windows & Doors is a small family business which sells directly to the public. No commission or high-pressure sales tactics. Our team is made up of caring, personable individuals with a dedication to our customers and to our company.  


Our focus is helping homeowners make the right investment for their homes. We believe that windows and doors should last, and that windows and doors should be chosen with the long-term in mind.

profile:
Homes are one the biggest investments a person will experience in their lifetime. Here at Aspen Windows and Doors we understand that when the time comes for renovations, each client wants a high quality product with the reassurance that their windows and doors are done to the best of ability. 

We offer customization within all out products ranging from fiberglass, steel, vinyl, composite, and European styled windows and doors. We install basic windows, bay windows, patio and storm doors and so much more! We specialize in the installation and replacement process with a factory-direct process.

To provide our customers with the best competing prices, we work directly with our main factory to eliminate the middleman and any unnecessary additional costs. All of our products are handled and crafted with the latest technologies and machinery to ensure the product meets all expectations.

profile:
For over 34 years we've been manufacturing and installing high quality vinyl replacement windows, steel doors, fiberglass doors, sliding doors and upgrading homes in Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton and over the GTA and beyond. You can count on our experience to do things right, and on our workmanship to make it look exactly how you envisioned - all at a price that is wallet-friendly.

Custom Window Designs is a member of CWDMA, a standard recognized as one of the best in the industry. What this means is that you can have confidence in dealing with a renovator whose excellence is recognized nationwide, backed by a written 10-year workmanship guarantee and an exclusive 25-year manufacturer warranty. You can also rest assured that will be around to honour them. Count on high value in the the service, workmanship and products involved.

We also use NO SUB-CONTRACTORS. What does this mean to you? This means that all of our employees work for us, not some 3rd party we have no control over. This allows us to guarantee the quality and expediency of the job, which means savings in both time and money for you.

profile:
Windows & Doors Ontario is a leading supplier and installer of quality windows and doors. Windows & Doors Ontario have been supplying and installing energy efficient windows, entry doors and garage doors for Ontario homeowners since 2001.
Our company manufactures and sells our product here in Canada specifically within the communities that have given us their support from the very beginning. We keep our manufacturing local and make sure that we employ experienced and expert artisans within our own area.
The focus of our designs is not just to spruce up your home from the outside. It is important that we create products that are functional and practical so that our customers could save money while ensuring our environment-friendly processes. We use energy-saving materials as well as construction methods such as our LOE-180 or 272 glass for premium insulation. Our priority is also to reduce carbon footprint and waste from our installation and constructing processes. We make sure you find no difficulties in removing and disposing your old doors and windows.
Experience convenience and hassle-free transactions with us from our free in-home estimates to our Ontario clients. We guarantee that our estimates have no hidden or additional costs at all. Our team takes pride in our installation process because our methods are tailored to cater to your schedule. You can trust our team of experts to provide accurate and detailed timelines while ensuring 100% satisfaction from you.
Contact Windows & Doors Ontario today to schedule your in-home estimate for free. Our knowledgeable and experienced representative will get in touch with you and assist you throughout the process. Update and boost your home and building with us to create a better community!

profile:
Trueseal has been family owned and operated since 1968. As President, Len Cook reflects on the changes in the renovation industry, as 3 generations now have been a part of the progress and changes to date! Bart Cook, Len’s Father started out in the 1950’s with his company, Windseal, when all there was to aide in drafty environments were storm windows and doors. Len started out in sales and installations for his Father until 1968, when Trueseal Window & Door Systems was born. 

***

With daughter Deb at his side for the past 33 years we are proud to be celebrating 51 years of making your home renovation dreams come true! There has been incredible progress in the quality of products available over the years! We are very proud of our crews’ workmanship and integrity, which allow us to boast “We are the bay and bow window specialists”! Our personal touch, along with superior Canadian made products have earned us a solid and steadfast reputation over the past 5 decades. Our best promoters are our satisfied customers, please feel free to peruse what they have to say about their experience with Trueseal Window and Door Systems!

profile:
SMART CHOICE – WINDOW AND DOOR SYSTEM INC. We are one of the leading suppliers and installers of windows and doors in Toronto, that are specially made to save energy. Our large inventory includes every conceivable window and door styles that you can imagine, from sliders and casements to European style tilt and turns and picture windows to elegant patio doors to well-secured entry doors, complemented by a range of colors and maintenance free interior options.
***
Our Windows and Doors are built to the highest industry specifications and all our window frames and sashes are fusion-welded in the factory, for that robust strength, with a lifetime factory processed seal for air and water leakage.
***
Smart Choice window and door panes are manufactured with double seal insulating glasses with multi-point locking systems on the casement for greater security, convenient operation, cool style, and durability. Our manufacturing environment is 100% lead-free, and PVC safe manufacturing process.
***
Any new windows and doors can bring up the value of your home considerably, more so with Smart Choice Window and Door System as they are crafted by homeowners like you with infinite care and well attentions to details, built using the finest materials with the most current technology. We guarantee your investment with the industry-leading warrant.

***

Call us today for an estimate.

profile:
PL Roof Windows Ltd is a manufacturer and installer with 30 years Windows, Doors Patio Door and Skylights installation experience in GTA. We design, manufacture, customize and install Windows, Doors Patio Door and Skylights with a wide selection, unique quality and excellent service. With all guaranteed products coming with limited lifetime warranty, we are one of the most reliable contractors in Windows, Doors Patio Door and Skylights industry. We’re the member of Building Industry and Land Development Association (BILD) GTA.

Our services are mainly Windows, Doors Patio Door and Skylights replacement, repair and installation services.

WINDOW, PATIO DOOR  & SKYLIGHTS – Invite natural light and enhance brightness inside your home and workplace, we offer high quality skylight, window and door; if you want to open new skylights glass, we also do both new opening skylight and skylight glass replacement.

In addition to adding lasting beauty and resale value to a house, our maintenance-free skylights, windows and doors reduce energy costs, reduce outside noise levels and operate smoothly time after time.

Best experience installer, superb customer service, and high quality products are just some of the reasons why PL Roof Windows Ltd., has been the preferred and trusted Windows, Doors Patio Door and Skylights manufacturer and installer in Toronto and the rest of GTA.

We take pride in every job we do for our customers. Our value is to serve our customers to their full satisfaction. PL Roof windows ’reputation is based on its commitment to innovative design, competitive price, and excellent customer service.

We service Toronto, Etobicoke, Scarborough, North York, Burlington, Markham, Richmond Hill, Brampton, Mississauga, Hamilton, Oakville Pickering, Oshawa, Ajax, Newmarket, Barrie, Aurora and the surrounding GTA.

Feel Free to browse our website http://plwindowsanddoors.com and for sure you’ll see what you’re looking for!

Also check us out at http://www.plskylight.com  for our Skylight

profile:
GLOBAL WINDOWS AND DOORS is a business established in 1980. Since that time thousands of homes have received their new looks, increased its value and saved heating and conditioning expenses by purchasing new vinyl windows.
Our windows are manufactured by our factory in GTA. We are Energy Star certified and all our windows received an outstanding Energy Efficiency test results

PVC-U products are manufactured from impact modified PVC compound specially formulated for the exacting requirements of windows and doors.

The formulation has a high degree of thermal stability and gives a silky smooth finish and an excellent resistance to impact. The extrusion process is carefully monitored to ensure that profiles are produced with minimum in-built stress.

The weathering and color fastness of the product has been proven by laboratory testing and by exposure in the field throughout the world in many different climatic conditions.
name: Global Windows & Doors Home Improvement Inc.

profile:
Yash Window Industry Ltd. have been installing energy efficient windows and doors for Ontario homeowners since many years. Our business evolved out of the need to provide homeowners with beautiful, durable and energy-efficient windows and doors – This is what our business is based on. We understand that choosing new windows and doors is an important decision and therefore we work with you to ensure you find the right options to meet your homes design, functional needs, and budget.

If you are ready to replace your home’s windows and doors, you have found the right company. We offer a superior product manufactured and installed to perfection at a great price. We understand the importance of superior style, exceptional good looks and extraordinary quality. We combine these qualities with top of the line security, incredible durability and superior energy efficiency to produce windows and doors that meet all your needs and beautify your home.

Most companies in the fenestration industry have a lifetime warranty. Very few provide the service described. Avoid labor costs. Enjoy prompt, polite and punctual service. Yash window Industry Ltd. are owned and operated by Canadians whom customers, dealers, and installers trust to provide service, and parts when required and according to priority. There is no need to shout for service, ask and we shall be happy to fix what is broken. We get more referrals from services than installations!
warranty_terms: Yes. Kindly ask for details. Depends on service provided.
name: Yash Windows and Doors

profile:
WHO WE ARE

ALUMINUM GLAZIER is proud of sharing a 20-year experience in glazing construction industry. Our portfolio includes number of most iconic buildings all over Ontario in the sports, health, science, defense, education, residential, commercial, retail and industrial sectors.

We specialize in commercial and residential glazing - from project management to installation - we pride ourselves on our flexibility and ability to undertake multiple concurrent projects.

The future of our community development is primarily based on effective partnerships. It's a key to better serving customers by merging talent, expertise, technology and purpose.

8 Hours of the "working at heights" training. Sounds long - but NO. The course provided by SafetyWerx comprises the terse and at the same time holistic information about hazards and thereof controls associated with the work at heights. In-class practice includes the vast variety of harvests, safety lines, connectors, extensions, etc... The instructor does an outstanding job to keep the audience involved and delivers the course in a very polite and understandable way. Despite your language proficiency, he will ensure the proper absorption of information in order to gain a profound understanding of not only safety regulations under the law (green book) but also unveils the best working practices to facilitate a safer work environment and things of this nature.

For sure I'll update my training when it's due at this particular place.

Thx again for the benevolence of the instructor as well as his thorough knowledge and experience.
name: ALUMINUM GLAZIER

✓ No secretary 
✓ No middleman 
✓ No hidden fees 
✓ No extra expenses from your pocket 

Our business is growing 
by serving satisfied customers, and getting recommendations
and referrals from these individuals, their relatives, friends and neighbors. 

If you order Doors from us you will pay only for 
Factory Door Price and Installation. 

✓ Patio Doors 
✓ Steel Doors 
✓ French Doors 
✓ Fiberglas Doors

profile:
Welcome to the House Tune Up Inc zone where quality products and workmanship along with reliability and friendly service reign for over a decade. 
House Tune Up is a fully licensed and insured general renovation company well established in the home improvement sector. 
We are an authorized distributor of exceptional windows and doors.
We also provide high quality bathroom renovations, basement finishings and kitchen renovations. We are a proud member of Renomark a mark of renovators excellence as well as Building Industry and Land Development Association (BILD).  Dedicated home improvement services across Oakville, Misssissauga, Burlington, Brampton and Toronto .
service_area: We are proudly servicing: Oakville, Mississauga, Burlington, Brampton, Hamilton, Toronto, Etobicoke and surrounding area.
products:
We offer a variety of  new renovation products and technologies. 
From revolutionary solutions in widows and doors to high end bath and kitchen fixtures.
services:
We specialize in: Vinyl windows and doors. Entrance Doors.
We also provide custom bathroom renovations, basement finishing and renovation. Custom and designer style pre built kitchens.
Complete and guaranteed home improvement services.
brands:
We are authorized distributor of revolutionary windows and doors by Dako. 
We also sale bathroom  and kitchen fixtures from most reputable brands as: Grohe, Hansgrohe, Maax, SlikPortfolio, Tidal vanities and other.
specialities:
We are proud to specialize in interior renovations. Bathroom renovation is most often a priority during home renovation.  Basement finishing adds a much needed space for a growing family. 
Kitchen renovation might be the most expensive project in your house yet it will add the most value to it.
name: House Tune Up
